title: The Year in Car Data Journalism
description: A review of notable data journalism stories from around the country in 2008, including analyses of Zillow sales data, a shipping database from the Port Import Export Reporting Service, California secretary of state records, Texas Ethics Commission records, D.C. school data, Georgia standardized test scores, property sales records, Delaware state fire school data, State Fire Marshal data, more than 7,000 paper inspection reports, USDA Farm Subsidy database, Federal Elections Commission database, Defense Dept. bill, campaign contributions, Arizona Department of Public Safety inspection records, campaign filings with the Federal Election Commission, and state payroll data.
